article_title: Raking It In At Summer Yard Sales

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: It's officially summer which means vacations, road trips and yes, lots of yard sales. Summer is peak yard sale season with homeowners hoping to interest those in packed cars by offering their wares on the lawn or, sometimes, in the garage.
